snippet.title: Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time - PlayStation 5 Features Trailer | PS5
snippet.description:
ttps://www.playstation.com/games/crash-bandicoot-4-its-about-time/?emcid=or-1s-412983

Toys For Bob dives into the enhanced features of Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time on PlayStation 5! The PS5 version of the game is available on March 12, the PS4 version is available now.

If you own the PS4 version of the game, an upgrade option is available at no cost. To upgrade the PlayStation 4 disc version of the game to the digital PS5 version, you’ll need a PS5 console with a disc drive. Owners of a PS4 disc copy must insert it into the PS5 every time they want to download or play the PS5 digital version.
